org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common

Interface Hyphenator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transform
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHyphenator

    public interface Hyphenator
extends Transform
    Hyphenating means breaking within words.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Hyphenator.FullHyphenator 
      static interface  Hyphenator.LineBreaker 
      static interface  Hyphenator.LineIterator 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hyphenator.FullHyphenator asFullHyphenator()
      Hyphenate by inserting soft hyphens and zero width spaces in order to indicate all the break opportunities within words.
      Hyphenator.LineBreaker asLineBreaker()
      Hyphenate by breaking an input into lines of a preferred and maximal length.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.Transform

        getIdentifier

    • Method Detail

      • asFullHyphenator

        Hyphenator.FullHyphenator asFullHyphenator()
                                    throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Hyphenate by inserting soft hyphens and zero width spaces in order to indicate all the break opportunities within words. Don't add new break opportunities to words that already have a soft hyphen or zero width space it them. Apart from the insertion of these special characters no other transformations are allowed. This means that non-standard hyphenation can not be supported through this interface.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • asLineBreaker

        Hyphenator.LineBreaker asLineBreaker()
                              throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Hyphenate by breaking an input into lines of a preferred and maximal length. Transformations such as non-standard hyphenation are allowed.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException
